short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MediTABion displays calming & inspiring images and helpful tips to promote mindfulness through meditation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It’s often the simple things in life that we tend to overlook, forget or disregard. This is why we built MediTABion. To serve as a daily reminder when searching the web of all the positives you can experience from as little as 5 minutes a day of meditation.

By clicking ‘Add to Chrome’ and installing this desktop extension, you are accepting and agreeing to install the MediTABion extension, and understand that your new tab will be replaced to that provided by the service with Yahoo search results, and the Privacy and Terms of Use of the extension.

Whether you’re thinking of beginning a daily mindfulness practise but struggling to get started. Or find it hard to remain disciplined and consistent with your meditation. MediTABion can help. The average person does between 3-4 search per day online. By using MediTABion to search the web, this is 3-4 daily reminders to start or continue your daily meditation session, as well as best practices on how to meditate.  

Privacy Policy: https://validclickapps.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: https://validclickapps.com/terms-of-service/
